    def __init__(self, cap, login=False):

            self.driver.get(self.Website_URLS['Home_page'])
            for cookie in cookies:
                self.driver.add_cookie(cookie)
            self.refresh_page()
            try:
                self.wait_and_get_element_by_xpath(self.LOGIN_BUTTON)
                login = False

                login = True

                self.quit()
